headline: Ask HN: Is the tech startup space oversaturated?
description:
It is more than likely that we are about to enter (and arguably we already are) in a overdue recession.

For someone that has an idea, built a working product and wants to scale it, the odds are greatly stacked against them with FAANG companies not helping in copying startups as if they are features, in addition to inflation and investors hesitant to invest as the “Good Times” are over.

Is there any point to building a startup in this climate?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 科技创业空间是否已经过饱和？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 科技創業空間是否已經過飽和？
description_zh-Hans: 对于那些有想法、建立了工作产品并希望扩大规模的人来说，除了通货膨胀和投资者因 "好日子 "结束而对投资犹豫不决之外，FAANG公司也不帮助复制初创企业，这对他们来说是非常不利的。
description_zh-Hant: 對於那些有想法、建立了工作產品並希望擴大規模的人來說，除了通貨膨脹和投資者因 "好日子 "結束而對投資猶豫不決之外，FAANG公司也不幫助複製初創企業，這對他們來說是非常不利的。
